text: Zafar Rasheed Bhatti (c. 1950 - April 27, 2020) was a Pakistani journalist. ==Career== Bhatti joined Associated Press of Pakistan (APP) in 1984 after having worked in Pakistan Press International and Nawaiwaqt. He remained associated with APP until 2010. During his association with APP, he worked as chief reporter of the news agency and served as president of the APP's employees' union. ==Death== He died on 27 April 2020 at the age of 70 in Islamabad after contracting coronavirus during a Tabligh visit. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2020 deaths Category:Pakistani male journalists Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Punjab, Pakistan Category:20th- century journalists Category:21st-century journalists Category:20th-century Pakistani writers Category:21st-century Pakistani writers
title: Zafar Rasheed Bhatti
